Question
========

The critical area for testing in a sample of 12 individuals with 5% risk two-way test whether a Spearman rank correlation coefficient equals is equal to 0 has as its limits

Answerlist
----------

* +/- 0.4965
* +/- 0.5804
* +/- 0.5515
* +/- 0.6364

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

+/- 0.4965: Incorrect
* 0.5804: Incorrect
* 0.5515: Correct
* +/- 0.6364: Incorrect
